cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 28th JUNE, 1918.IgSTERN FRONT.On the French front the situation is unchanged.On the British front, the operations carried out this morning South of the Forest of NIB?BE-, are reported to have been very successful. All objectives were gained and about' 200 prisoners captured.ITALIAN FRONT.On the night 26th/27th June, the enemy by a surprise attack-, captured MONTE CO HMO in the vALK-lRSA, which was take from them by the Italians early in May,. On the morning of tho 27th, the Italians counter-attacked and completely re-captured the position.On the rest of the front there is nothing to report,.General Staff, ----7/ar Office, S. v? .1. 28th June, 1910. Issued at 6.30 p.m.
